description.narrative: This activity (Justice System Support Programme (JSSP)) is a component of Strengthening Rule of Law in Pakistan reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £15,314,237. This component benefits Pakistan, and works in the following sector(s): Legal and judicial development. , with the following implementing partners: Adam Smith International. The start date is 23-02-2016 and the end date is 31-03-2021.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Justice, Law and Order - Justice, Law, Order and Security - Justice, Law and Order - policy, planning and administration
